physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Limited elbow range of motion (15° of active extension to 65° of active flexion), intact motor and sensory function of the radial and median nerves, no sensation to light touch in the ulnar nerve distribution, dry and cracked skin over the ulnar half of the ring and small fingers, positive Froment sign, weak dorsal interosseus muscles, weak finger abduction/adduction, negative Pitres-Testut sign.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Range of motion evolved from 10° of extension to 70° of flexion, then 10° of extension to 65° of flexion postoperatively, and finally 15° of active extension to 65° of active flexion at the last examination.
